scenario_text.value:
Oh, Takuma. I was just thinking about those
two kids.
Which two kids? You mean Miyuki and Haru?

Yes, them. Don’t you think there’s something
about them has changed?

No, they seem the same as ever to me. Why?
Did something happen between you and them?

Oh, no. Nothing like that. Er, forgive me
for asking that.

(What’s going on with the Professor? He’s
acting pretty strange himself.)

Takuma, is it just me or does the Professor
seem to be weirdly interested in Miyuki?
I don’t know. I’m... I’m sure it’s nothing.
